sections.title: Proud Rat Emotes
sections.description: Have these proud little vermin. I use them on a Discord, but do with them as you please. No credits needed, more flags to come. Write me if you would love to have a specific flag!

sections.title: Fruit!
sections.description: In honor of the participants of my study for the Master's Thesis, I drew some fruit! Take it with you, and eat up.

sections.title: Critters Font
sections.description: A simple pixel font that is supposed to resemble little monsters. I made it to have my own personal font for this site and wanted to share it. No credits needed.
